H0.text: when did gordon brown resigns. 10 May 2010

H1.text: when did gordon brown resigns. 27 June 2007

H2.text: when did gordon brown resigns. 1 April 2008

H3.text: when did gordon brown resigns. 7 January, 2007

A4.text: Brown announced on 10 May 2010 that he would stand down as Labour Leader, with a view to a successor being chosen before the next Labour Party Conference in September 2010.

A5.text: Brown was invited by the queen to form a government and become prime minister on 27 June 2007.
